update.description:
Added inline namespaces, and disabled Generator from being installed.

Inline namespaces for the messages will come later (I'm aware that protobuf recommends not distributing the generated messages).

Also removed Generator from installation. In order to remove doxygen documentation I renamed the class to Private.
update.title: Inline namespace

content.raw: thanks, it makes more sense now
Utility is special because it's a bunch of c-style functions that are not encapsulated in a class. We had to do the same in Helpers.cc in ign-math.
content.html: Utility is special because it's a bunch of c-style functions that are not encapsulated in a class. We had to do the same in Helpers.cc in ign-math.

content.raw:
I don't fully understand how the inline namespaces work; my question was just based on pattern-matching. We modified Utility.hh and Utility.cc, but only Factory.hh. I'll take people's word that we don't need to touch Factory.cc, but I don't feel comfortable approving this if I don't understand it.

You can merge without my approval though.
content.html:
I don't fully understand how the inline namespaces work; my question was just based on pattern-matching. We modified Utility.hh and Utility.cc, but only Factory.hh. I'll take people's word that we don't need to touch Factory.cc, but I don't feel comfortable approving this if I don't understand it.

You can merge without my approval though.

content.raw:
Can you explain why Factory.cc would need to be modified? For example, the `Box` class in ign-math doesn't have inline-namespace modifications in the source file.

I think if Factory had a private data class, then we'd need to modify the source file.
content.html:
Can you explain why Factory.cc would need to be modified? For example, the Box class in ign-math doesn't have inline-namespace modifications in the source file.

I think if Factory had a private data class, then we'd need to modify the source file.

content.raw: I don't get why Factory.cc doesn't need to be modified even though Factory.hh was
content.html: I don't get why Factory.cc doesn't need to be modified even though Factory.hh was

content.raw: I should update the migration guide. However, the installed Generator.hh file is essentially useless because we don't distribute a library with Generator.cc compiled in.
content.html: I should update the migration guide. However, the installed Generator.hh file is essentially useless because we don't distribute a library with Generator.cc compiled in.

content.raw: the only thing I'm not sure about is not installing Generator, but that's probably just ignorance on my part
content.html: the only thing I'm not sure about is not installing Generator, but that's probably just ignorance on my part

content.raw: I think this is all okay. I'm going to merge sometime this afternoon, just a heads up to everyone.
content.html: I think this is all okay. I'm going to merge sometime this afternoon, just a heads up to everyone.

content.raw: Consider to add a test that checks for unversioned symbols. See [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/301/add-versioned-inline-namespace/diff#chg-test/integration/CMakeLists.txt) for an example. Credit to @sloretz , who I believe was the original author in other library.
